Digital products done properly

Hi, I’m Mike. I’ll help you bring your digital product to market with solid foundations, room to scale, and costs under control.

A guide through the unknown

Traditionally, developing a digital product is an expensive, time consuming endeavour that frequently offers little return on investment. What’s more, professional software development is completely unregulated, making choosing a competent development partner a risky proposition.

My goal is to de-risk your digital product development journey. I combine true technical expertise, extensive industry experience, and excellent communication skills to bring your product to market in the form of a quality, scaleable piece of software that generates real value for your business.

Someone who understands business

It can be hard to move quickly in a business environment. There are tradeoffs to be made, stakeholders to win over, value to prove, priorities that change, and blockers to avoid.

I’ve spent the past decade working to become adept at delivering software in these conditions. I’ll work closely with the relevant stakeholders in your business to make sure there’s a clear shared vision for your product aligned with your strategic objectives.

A safe pair of hands

It’s all too common for software development projects to go off the rails. Typically losing time, money and opportunity with with an inexperienced development partner.

I’ve built products for businesses of many different sizes and in many different sectors over the past decade. I know my onions, but I also know when there's value in defering to subject matter experts for a second opinion or additional development support.

Services

Product audits

If your digital product is slow, buggy, or simply not converting as well as you’d expected, then this is for you. For £749 I’ll perform a deep dive into your digital product provide you with a bespoke analysis report detailing actions you can take to fix a specific issue.

Product consultancy

For if you’re looking to build a new digital product, or would like longer term technical in your business. I'll work closely with you to guide technical decision making in accordance with your organisation’s tactical and strategic objectives, while speaking a language you understand.

Product development

For a fixed price, I’ll work on your digital product for you. I’ll coordinate with stakeholders in your business to establish clear requirements, and then deliver expertly crafted software that fully realises your vision with a clear return on investment for your business.
